os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: Linux

name: raminux
short_description:
some key features of this project:

-advanced use of package groups using Arch linux's pacman package manager
-upstart init system which is running openrc
-small xorg setup mechanism which can be managed by ncurses based dialog boxes and kernel parameters
-udev/pmount based block device mounting
-ncurses based dialog boxes setting system parameters (time, date; locale settings; keyboard layout...)
-sudo to run programs as different users
-quickly installable with text mode installer
-XFCE main X11 desktop
summary: raminos linux - independent distribution with small repository
